Reviews.Title: This is a great phone
Reviews.Author: Sergio O.
Reviews.Content: I always have love the Nexus line. I gave my rating because it's a great phone, cheap and you get always the updates, first. I will always recommend this line.

Reviews.Title: Nexus 5
Reviews.Author: BRIAN MARSHALL "DINKY"
Reviews.Content: Great phone, nice features, works well, feels good, one of the best Android phones on the market, great price but poor Battery

Reviews.Title: mixed feeling
Reviews.Author: muhand
Reviews.Content: I like the pure android experience and big screenBut I realty hated the sharp edges and build quality of volume keys and bad sound of the power key also the lower bezelOverall is the best of what I have owned so car an am a tech kinda a guy who doesn't easily give 4. I have own galaxy s4 and note3 am not going to change this for until soon when 2k screen and better camera launches.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, but poor cell reception
Reviews.Author: K. Zutter "Ken"
Reviews.Content: I almost sent this back. At first I had two problems, 1) Battery not lasting all day, and 2) poor AT&T; reception.The battery thing cleared itself up - I think it had to learn, and/or go through a few charge cycles. Now OK, not great, but OK.The cell reception I live with. It was really bad at my house, so resurrected a microcell that I had at my last residence.Note that my Samsung S4 and my wife's iPhone have no reception problems at my house.I would not buy again, and if I did, I would buy directly from Google as the return period and process would be better.However, I have now grown quite fond it.
